title: Club tags not showing in game
body: Even though I have "show club tags" enabled on client. Is there a hotkey to show/hide them in game that I might have accidentally pressed?

replies.body: It seems to be fixed now, not sure what happened.
What's the name of your club? I can take a look on the backend and see if I can poke that club a few times to get it to show up again!
It's not exclusive to my club, on the loading screen or in game, absolutely no club tag are shown
